content: work the next row knitting knit stitches and purling the purl stitches fifth decrease * purl 1 knit 1 purl 1 k2tog repeat from * to end 40 stitches remain work one row purling purl stitches and knitting knit stitches p1 k1 to end sixth decrease purl two together p2tog k2tog until the end 20 stitches remain final row purl 1 k1 to the end bind off snip the yarn leaving about 12 inches pull the yarn through the loops knot securely to finish the hat hand wash gently warm water and delicate soap shape and block before drying on a towel or mat if you have issues or would like to suggest a correction please let me know https //www ravelry com/people/dokinchan
